S2LET CODE www.s2let.org Fast wavelet transforms on the sphere ---------------------------------------------------------------- DESCRIPTION The S2LET code provides functionality to perform fast and exact scale-discretised wavelet transforms on the sphere. CURRENT VERSION Release 2.0b1, September 2015 PREVIOUS VERSIONS Release 1.1b1, October 2013 Release 1.0b1, November 2012 AUTHORS B. Leistedt (www.ixkael.com/blog) J. D. McEwen (www.jasonmcewen.org) M. Buttner REFERENCES J. D. McEwen, M. Buttner, B. Leistedt, H. V. Peiris, Y. Wiaux, P. Vandergheynst, Spin scale-discretised wavelets on the sphere, IEEE TSP, 2015 . J. D. McEwen, M. Buttner, B. Leistedt, H. V. Peiris, Y. Wiaux, A novel sampling theorem on the rotation group, IEEE TSP, 2015. B. Leistedt, Y. Wiaux, P. Vandergheynst and J. D. McEwen, S2LET: A code to perform fast wavelet analysis on the sphere, Astronomy & Astrophysics, 558, A128, 2013 (arXiv:1211.1680) J. D. McEwen and Y. Wiaux, A novel sampling theorem on the sphere, IEEE Trans. Sig. Proc., 59, 2011 (arXiv:1110.6298). DOCUMENTATION See doc/index.html INSTALLATION See documentation REQUIREMENTS SSHT (http://www.spinsht.org/) SO3 (http://www.sothree.org/) FFTW (http://www.fftw.org/) OPTIONAL CFITSIO (http://heasarc.gsfc.nasa.gov/fitsio/) HEALPIX (http://healpix.jpl.nasa.gov/) DOWNLOAD http://www.s2let.org/ SUPPORT Please email the authors. NOTE The package is in beta and is still under development. Please report problems/bugs by email to: boris.leistedt@gmail.com LICENSE S2LET package to perform fast wavelet transform on the sphere
